description: This Java class provides a simple salted SHA-256 password hashing and verification service, intended for demonstration purposes.

classes.name: PasswordService
classes.description: Service class providing password hashing and verification methods with salting using SHA-256.

methods.name: hash
methods.description: Generates a salted SHA-256 hash of the provided password and encodes it as 'salt:hash'.

methods.name: verify
methods.description: Verifies a password against a stored 'salt:hash' string.

methods.name: digest
methods.description: Creates a SHA-256 digest from given salt and password.

methods.name: constantTimeEquals
methods.description: Performs a constant-time comparison of two strings to prevent timing attacks.
